description:
The Op-Op Fruit is in Corazon`s hands! But the price he paid to get it might be too high... When Law goes for help, unfortunate coincidences intervene and leave the two vulnerable! Meanwhile, Doflamingo and his clan finally land at Minion Island; the location of Corazon and Law!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Moment der Entscheidung – Corazóns Abschied!
Kakugo no Toki: Corazon Wakare no Egao!
L`instant de résolution. Le sourire d`adieu de Corazon !
The Moment of Resolution! Corazon`s Farewell Smile!
В момент решимости. Прощальная улыбка Коразона
覚悟の時 コラソン別れの笑顔!
